tool_description: A List of Worlds Biggest Cities
name: BiggestCities
title: BiggestCities

api_list.name: Get Cities by filter

test_endpoint.message: You are not subscribed to this API.

api_list.name: Get All Cities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://biggestcities.p.rapidapi.com/X2Q53F/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biggestcities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://biggestcities.p.rapidapi.com/X2Q53F/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "biggestcities.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
